statements: SELECT * FROM payment_workflow_customization
SELECT customer_id, payment_preference FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM payment_workflow_customization ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, payment_preference FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE payment_preference = 'Credit Card'
SELECT customer_id, transaction_history FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE JSON_LENGTH(transaction_history) > 0
SELECT customer_id, payment_preference FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_preference, transaction_history FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE payment_preference = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, payment_preference, transaction_history FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_history FROM payment_workflow_customization WHERE payment_preference LIKE '%PayPal%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email, transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT preference_id, customer_id, preferred_payment_method FROM preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount < 500
SELECT c.customer_name, p.preferred_payment_method FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preferred_payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type = 'credit card';
SELECT method_type, COUNT(method_id) AS total_methods FROM payment_methods GROUP BY method_type;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT * 
FROM transactions 
WHERE amount > 1000 
ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, full_name, email 
FROM customers 
INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id 
WHERE notification_emails = TRUE 
ORDER BY full_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number 
FROM customers 
WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id 
FROM payment_methods 
WHERE method_type = 'credit card');

SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date 
FROM transactions 
WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id 
FROM customers 
WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%') 
ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT customer_id, method_type, card_number 
FROM payment_methods 
WHERE expiry_date >= '2022-01-01' 
ORDER BY customer_id ASC, method_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id >= 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
